wikipedia_page.main: William Glynne-Jones (1907–1977) was a Welsh fiction and children's writer, broadcaster and journalist. His stories were broadcast weekly on BBC Children's Hour.

response: *December 19 – William Glynne-Jones, Welsh novelist and children's writer (died 1977)
